post_analysis.post_topic: Claude Agent Skills - procedural skills extension mechanism for Claude agents
post_analysis.post_summary: Anthropic launched Agent Skills - a mechanism for extending agent capabilities with packaged instructions, scripts, and resources in folders. Skills provide efficient context management, predictable results, and distribution capabilities. They work across all Claude products and can execute code in sandboxed environments.
